üöÄ INNOVATION PIPELINE - MULTIS√ìCIOS

Dashboard din√¢mico do pipeline de inova√ß√£o com projetos e pilotos

üìä PIPELINE DE INOVA√á√ÉO

TABLE choice(status, "üí°","üìã","üöß","üß™","üöÄ") AS "Status",
 link(file.link, title) AS "Projeto",
 owner AS "Owner",
 effort_weeks + "w" AS "Esfor√ßo",
 "R$ " + budget AS "Budget",
 metrics_first_month AS "Meta 1¬∫ M√™s"
FROM "4-Projetos"
WHERE (type = "project" OR type = "pilot") AND status != "template" AND type != "template"
SORT status, priority DESC, file.cday ASC

üìà M√âTRICAS DO PIPELINE

Projetos por Status

TABLE length(rows) as "Quantidade",
 round(sum(budget) / 1000, 1) + "k" as "Or√ßamento Total (R$)"
FROM "4-Projetos"
WHERE (type = "project" OR type = "pilot") AND status != "template" AND type != "template"
GROUP BY status
SORT length(rows) DESC

Projetos por Prioridade

TABLE length(rows) as "Quantidade",
 round(sum(budget) / 1000, 1) + "k" as "Or√ßamento Total (R$)"
FROM "4-Projetos"
WHERE (type = "project" OR type = "pilot") AND status != "template" AND type != "template"
GROUP BY priority
SORT priority DESC

üéØ PR√ìXIMOS MARCO

Projetos em Andamento

LIST
FROM "4-Projetos/Ativos"
WHERE status = "in-progress"
SORT file.cday ASC
LIMIT 5

Pilotos em Execu√ß√£o

LIST
FROM "4-Projetos/Pilotos/Em-Execucao"
WHERE status = "pilot"
SORT file.cday ASC
LIMIT 5

üìã BACKLOG DE IDEIAS

Ideias Pendentes

LIST
FROM "4-Projetos/Backlog"
WHERE status = "idea"
SORT priority DESC, file.cday ASC
LIMIT 10

Pilotos Ideias

LIST
FROM "4-Projetos/Pilotos/Ideias"
WHERE status = "idea"
SORT priority DESC, file.cday ASC
LIMIT 10
